entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 13. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
